subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Baseball
Testosterone
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Thirty-five suspensions have been handed out since baseball began penalizing major leaguers who failed drug tests, but few of those involved are as renowned as Ryan Braun.
snippet: Thirty-five suspensions have been handed out since baseball began penalizing major leaguers who failed drug tests, but few of those involved are as renowned as Ryan Braun.
